metadata.synopsis: The player triggered hostilities during the party with Withers, ending the festivities on a sour note.

2.speaker: Withers
2.text: Fascinating. Thou hast ventured long with thy comrades; shared food, fire, and friendship, but even such adamantine bonds could not prevent thee from ruining my party.

0.speaker: Withers
0.text: I shall not permit you to destroy one another, after all thou accomplished. Begone!
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Withers gestures, and the player is pulled through a portal

1.speaker: Withers
1.text: Suddenly I am most tired. Good day.
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Withers gestures, and the player is pulled through a portal
